This information may be gathered by us in connection with the following:
This means that, if you have provided personal data to us directly, we are using it with your consent or for the performance of a contract, and that data is processed using automated means, you can ask us for a copy of that personal data to re-use with another service or business in many cases.
In the event that you submit your personal details by telephone, please note that the Company may monitor or record your call for one or more of the following purposes:
As a Company customer, we may also use your contact information to inform you of other products or services we think might interest you.

You may provide us with your feedback, ask us questions about this policy, view the information collected from you to date, or obtain a printed copy of our policy statement and/or the name of the individual in charge of our privacy policy by writing to or emailing us at the addresses above (see: How you can contact us)
The Company may also transfer personal data to the Company-affiliated companies in other countries.
We will only transfer your personal data to countries that have been deemed to provide an adequate level of protection for personal data by the European Commission.

In addition, we limit access to your personal data to those employees, agents, contractors and other third parties who have a business need to know.
They will only process your personal data on our instructions and they are subject to a duty of confidentiality.
Our carefully selected partners and service providers may process personal information about you on our behalf as described below.
Our carefully selected partners and service providers may process personal information about you on our behalf as described below.

All personal data you submit will be controlled and stored securely by the Company.
The Company may also transfer personal data to the Company-affiliated companies in other countries.
The Company will only process personal data in accordance with the applicable rules and this privacy policy.
This means that, if you have provided personal data to us directly, we are using it with your consent or for the performance of a contract, and that data is processed using automated means, you can ask us for a copy of that personal data to re-use with another service or business in many cases.
We collect personal data from you for the purpose of processing your order or enquiry.
We may use your personal data to supply products and services to you that you have requested, carry out any agreement with you or take any steps that you have requested.
We respect the privacy of everyone who visits this website (www.appointedd.com) ("this website" or "our site") and will only collect and use personal data in ways that are described here, and in a way that is consistent with our obligations and your rights under the law.
We want you to know how we will collect, use and disclose the personal data you provide to us.
We will only retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfil the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.
We will only transfer your personal data to countries that have been deemed to provide an adequate level of protection for personal data by the European Commission.
Where you have given us appropriate permission or where we are permitted  by law, we may use your personal data for the following purposes and direct marketing ('Additional Purposes'):
With your permission and/or where permitted by law, we may also use your personal data for marketing purposes, which may include contacting you by email and text message with information, news, and offers on our services.
